name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior IT Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, leveraging expertise in **PKI**, **HSM**, and **asymmetric cryptography**. Adept in both **Windows** and **Linux** environments, demonstrating strong skills in **EJBCA**, **X.509**, and **PKCS#11** certification processes. Proven ability to align IT solutions with organizational objectives, implement robust **auditing** practices, and adhere to **ITIL** frameworks.

Well-versed in developing and deploying complex applications with a solid foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside hands-on experience with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Specialized in building AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and automation.

Expert in cloud-native architectures using **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven systems, and CI/CD pipelines. Strong commitment to compliance, with experience in HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. A collaborative team player, fluent in both **German** and **English**, with a demonstrated readiness and willingness to embrace new learning opportunities.

- Engaged in continuous integration of security features into new applications, maximizing overall **system efficiency** and user trust.
- Provided bilingual (Deutsch and Englisch) support and documentation, catering to diverse client needs and fostering better communication within the team.
